playbooks.name: Backhaul latency remediation
steps: Verify backhaul latency and packet loss for impacted sites
Reroute traffic to alternate path if available
Open transport vendor ticket if latency persists

playbooks.name: Cell congestion mitigation
steps: Enable temporary capacity expansion or load balancing
Schedule permanent capacity upgrade if repeated

playbooks.name: Core CPU saturation
steps: Validate CPU/MEM utilization on core nodes
Open core vendor ticket if thresholds remain breached
